application_instruction: Note: By applying to this position your application is automatically submitted to the following locations: Sunnyvale, CA, USA; New York, NY, USA
description:
Google's projects, like our users, span the globe and require managers to keep the big picture in focus while being able to dive into the unique engineering challenges we face daily. As a Program Manager at Google, you lead complex, multi-disciplinary engineering projects using your engineering expertise. You plan requirements with internal customers and usher projects through the entire project lifecycle. This includes managing project schedules, identifying risks and clearly communicating them to project stakeholders. You're equally at home explaining your team's analyses and recommendations to executives as you are discussing the technical trade-offs in product development with engineers.

The Operational Assurance team aims to provide verifiable assurance to users that Google Apps and the systems that process Apps User Data meet users' data protection, privacy and accessibility expectations.

The work requires you to build and grow strong partnerships with Google’s central Security and Privacy teams, Technical Infrastructure teams, Apps Product and Engineering teams and Legal.

The web is what you make of it and our team is helping the world make more of the web. From open-source pros to user-experience extraordinaires, we develop products that help users connect, communicate and collaborate with others. Our consumer products and cloud platforms are giving millions of users at homes, businesses, universities and nonprofits around the world the tools that shape their web experience -- and changing the way they think about computing.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing this form.
qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Experience in privacy, security, data protection, or user trust.
  • Experienced people manager
  • Experience managing multi-quarter, cross-functional engineering projects.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience implementing Google Data Protection technologies.
  • Experience driving privacy guidelines and data handling improvements with machine learning programs.
  • Experience influencing and navigating priorities across large number of product and engineering teams.
  • Passionate and knowledgeable about interaction between privacy, security and compliance.
responsibilities:
• Act as Lead for complex programs that address user data protection and across Apps including access management, release management, logging and auditing, data use and processing.
  • Work with software engineers to develop sounds technical solutions that are suitable for Google Apps/G Suite infrastructure.
  • Drive user data protection towards increased automation and proactive risk management by implementing programs, tools and instrumentation to prevent and detect user data protection gaps.
  • Give direction and manage a team of T/PgMs to implement qualified program designs.
title: Lead Program Manager, Google Apps, Privacy
